```{r}
library(osmdata)
library(sf)

ol<- sf::read_sf("Oloisukut2.kml")
ol

call <- opq(bbox = c(35.05753, -1.172495,35.10596,-1.133883)) 
call <- add_osm_feature(call, key = "roads",value="motorway")
mydata <- osmdata_sf(call)
mydata

# The returned object stores some points, lines and polygons.

# First get background map
library(ggmap)
library(ggplot2)

mad_map <- get_map(getbb("Kenya"), maptype = "roadmap",source="osm",color="bw")

install.packages("rgeos")
library(maptools)
#Then plot:
ggmap(mad_map)+
  geom_sf(data = mydata$osm_lines,
          geometry = "line", 
          inherit.aes = FALSE)

```
